DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_03_01: Oh, a defender of the law, a guardian of order, probably burdened with moral doubts...
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_03_02: Hello, hello, distinguished citizen. What brings you here? Some problem? A dilemma to be solved?
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_What_03_02: I was right, there's obviously something on your heart. Or the mind which researchers believe is responsible for all feelings. Can you imagine that?
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_What_03_03: Love, fear, hate, all of these are just products of your mind that you don't fully control...
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_Yes_03_02: The mysteries of the mind are fascinating... I think I'll write a dissertation on it. But, but, but, what brings you to me? A deliberate act or a stroke of fate?
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_Yes_03_03: Oh, you see, fate is also a topic worth talking about. Some believe in its existence, others believe that our paths are drawn by the gods. Who's right?
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_Yes_15_04: I don't know. I think my friend is calling me. I'll see you later.
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_Yes_03_05: Hope so, hope so. Regardless of who makes your paths, may they not be dangerous.
DIA_Crisen_QM202_Hello_Why_15_01: Why are you interested in this?
DIA_Crisen_YouBack_09_01: Are you back to talk about the dilemmas you've been having?
